title: Indoor Positioning-Based Fingerprint Recognition System Design: Leveraging Transfer Learning Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Students use BYOD (smart devices) to collect data and test models in real school environments, with transfer learning simulations via online platforms.

learning_goals: Students can describe at least three distribution characteristics of indoor positioning fingerprint data
Students can implement step-by-step processes to design target environment models using a transfer-learning-based distance measurement framework
Students can build a system that achieves over 80% location recognition accuracy using real-collected data

resources: Mobile App for Wi-Fi/Bluetooth Signal Collection
Web-Based Platform for Transfer Learning Simulation Education
Indoor Map and Location Marker Set
Group Tablets (5 Units) for Collaborative Learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
